info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 2:17PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Putnam, eastern Defiance, eastern Paulding and central Henry Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 217 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Paulding, or 11 miles southwest of Defiance, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and dime size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Defiance around 235 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Holgate and Napoleon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
